programme.title: Ollie And Friends

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, bad-ass stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: "play," "pause" and "fast forward" to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: The Miracle Barbershop
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. The Miracle Barbershop is a 5 part fantasy web series - where we delve into the remorse of 5 persons - a husband who desires to see his wife's smile for a last time, a young girl wishes to confess her love, a mother hopes to make her son one final meal, a daughter longs to fulfil the dying wish of her mother and a father to fulfill his last promise to his daughter. These persons fulfil their last wishes and find peace before departing for their next journey afterlife.

programme.desc: Ah Ma pays a visit to Phua Chu Kang and Rosie Phua, who are now based in Malaysia. Almost as soon as she arrives, she disappears, only to resurface mysteriously tending to an elderly man at a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, where residents have been dying one by one.
